name: Bedwars
description:
BEDWARS | 2 Players | OFFLINE | 1.4.7 :

Destroy the opponent's bed and defeat them. Collect iron, gold, and diamond in the forge in the middle.

RECOMMENDED:
Play on fullscreen
Play on PC (not support mobile)

PLAYER 1 (BLUE):
W to jump
A to go left
D to go right
S to use held object
Q to change held object
E to upgrade your sword
1 to buy 16 wool blocks (4 iron)
2 to buy 1 fire charge (10 iron)
3 to buy 16 arrows (2 gold)
4 to buy Upgrade Iron Forge (4 diamonds)
5 to buy Active Heal Pool (3 diamonds)

PLAYER 2 (RED):
up arrow to jump
left arrow to go left
right arrow to go right
down arrow to use held object
M to change held object
N to upgrade your sword
9 to buy 16 wool blocks (4 iron)
0 to buy 1 fire charge (10 iron)
I to buy 16 arrows (2 gold)
O to buy Upgrade Iron Forge (4 diamonds)
P to buy Active Heal Pool (3 diamonds)

UPGRADED IRON FORGE:
gives you 1 iron every 2 seconds

HEAL POOL:
when at your base, you gain 1 extra health point every second

BED DESTRUCTION:
destroy the bed with your sword

FIRE CHARGE:
use the fire charge to destroy placed blocks and to knock players off platforms

WOOL PLACING:
wool is placed beneath your feet when used

INVISIBILITY POTION:
used when bought

SWORD UPGRADES:
wooden sword: free
stone sword: 10 iron
iron sword: 7 gold
diamond sword : 3 emeralds

Credit:
Original: chealseasoccer13
Original game: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/551762694
Remix: umarfathi (scratch) UmarNotFat (itch.io)
Texture: https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/texture-packs/bare-bones-texture-pack, Picode_on_Scratch (scratch)

Thank you for playing!
